ing: 3 green garlic (garlic scapes), cut into pieces
1/2 jalapeno pepper, seeded and coarsely chopped
salt and black pepper to taste
des: "If you are fortunate (as I am) to have a grocer who carries green garlic, you might want to try this dip which I whupped up. This goes great with artichokes."
ins: Place the green garlic, cilantro, olive oil, sherry, lemon juice, and jalapeno pepper into a blender or food processor. Blend until pureed. Scrape into a bowl, and mix in the sour cream until evenly blended. Season to taste with salt and black pepper. Refrigerate before serving.
